Scripts.OnScrollRangeChanged: if ( self.allowedRange and yrange > self.allowedRange + 1 ) then -- temp fix to jitter scroll (see task 39261) else ScrollFrame_OnScrollRangeChanged(self, xrange, yrange); end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.Top:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLeft, "TOPRIGHT") self.Top:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.TopRight, "BOTTOMLEFT")
self.Bottom:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.BottomLeft, "TOPRIGHT") self.Bottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomRight, "BOTTOMLEFT")
self.Left:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.Left:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomLeft, "TOPRIGHT")
self.Right:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopRight, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.Right:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomRight, "TOPRIGHT")
self.Top:SetVertexColor(1, 0.82, 0) self.Bottom:SetVertexColor(1, 0.82, 0) self.Left:SetVertexColor(1, 0.82, 0) self.Right:SetVertexColor(1, 0.82, 0) self.TopLeft:SetVertexColor(1, 0.82, 0) self.TopRight:SetVertexColor(1, 0.82, 0) self.BottomLeft:SetVertexColor(1, 0.82, 0) self.BottomRight:SetVertexColor(1, 0.82, 0)

self.Top:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLeft, "TOPRIGHT") self.Top:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.TopRight, "BOTTOMLEFT")
self.Bottom:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.BottomLeft, "TOPRIGHT") self.Bottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomRight, "BOTTOMLEFT")
self.Left:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.Left:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomLeft, "TOPRIGHT")
self.Right:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopRight, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.Right:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomRight, "TOPRIGHT")
